name: Slippy Knight (Jeffrey Uppelschoten)
description:
Slippy Dungeon is a puzzle game combined with some old-school adventure style mechanics. Slip and slide through dungeons and hit items on your slippery path.

Push blocks, open chests, find keys and avoid lava! Can you reach the end?

The game is in development and any feedback is very welcome!

Note: iOS users need to download the Testflight app from the appstore and click this link or scan the QR below.
